title: PBE Issue
body:
PBE 0 Essence and 0 RP?

Fix Please?

replies.body: On PBE I only had 3000 RP and 5 BE... Anyone know what happened to my 999000 of both ???
Mee too i lost my 999k rp and i could only have 1049rp because i think riot gonna give more rp

As always, those currencies are being [**added at specific times each day**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence). It usually happens around 11am PST each day.
